epic.description:
Implement HAIAMM Verification function practices to establish AI security review and testing processes.

## Overview

The Verification function answers: *How do you verify AI agents work correctly?*

## Practices Included

| Practice | Code | Purpose |
|----------|------|---------|
| Design Review | DR | Review AI system designs for security flaws |
| Implementation Review | IR | Review AI implementations for vulnerabilities |
| Security Testing | ST | Test AI systems for security weaknesses |

## Target Maturity

- [ ] Level 1: Foundation
- [ ] Level 2: Structured
- [ ] Level 3: Optimized

## Success Criteria

- Design review process integrated into SDLC
- Code review checklist includes AI security items
- Security testing suite for AI systems operational
- Test automation integrated into CI/CD

## Key Risks Addressed

- ASI05: Unexpected Code Execution
- ASI06: Memory & Context Poisoning
- LLM01: Prompt Injection
- LLM05: Improper Output Handling
- LLM09: Misinformation

## References

- [HAIAMM Handbook](https://github.com/R3v3rzk1mur4/HAIAMM/docs/handbook/00-INDEX.md)
- [Security Review Gate Checklist](https://github.com/R3v3rzk1mur4/HAIAMM/docs/templates/checklists/security-review-gate-checklist.md)
